name: D96: Kansei
description:
Welcome to the Drift Valley! Get on with the local car culture. Start your journey by buying your first car, practice your driving skills and upgrade your ride.

  • Upgrade and tune your car!


    Increase the power of your engine and change its parameters, fine-tune the suspension and don't forget about the external styling of the car.



  • Explore the open world of drift valley!

    Urban areas and mountain passes, narrow city streets and wide highways with multi-level interchanges, gas stations and roadside shops, workshops are waiting for you in the drift valley!




  • Drive with pleasure


    All cars are different and have their own character, but it's a pleasure to drive each one!
